message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $18000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I've invested a significant amount of time and resources into this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $19500. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $18500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out. I'm counteroffering at $19000. This is my final offer, but I'm willing to negotiate further if you're willing to meet me halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $18200 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to think about my minimum acceptable price. I'm counteroffering at $18500. This is my best and final offer, but I'm willing to sell to you for this price if you're willing to meet me here.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $17800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to think about my minimum acceptable price. I'm counteroffering at $18000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $17500 for the product. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $15000.
